opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: In Re Discipline of Gomez. No. D-2376

opinion:
541 U.S. 985

IN RE DISCIPLINE OF GOMEZ.
No. D-2376.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 19, 2004.

1

Mark Andrew Gomez, of Newnan, Ga., is suspended from the practice of law in this Court, and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
